content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: ChangeUserEmail path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/users/{user_id}/change_email content: params
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum update a users email address
desc this immediately invalidates the users stackpath customer portal logins and api tokens
reqbody
identitychangeuseremailrequest
type obj
props
email
type str
desc the users new email address
password
type str
desc the users login password
required true
responses
title: 32_Users_ChangeUserEmail_176.json
